energylivenews.com/2015/04/f1-engineers-.snippet: Formula One engineers are developing a technology which can cut the energy usage of supermarket fridges. The engineers from Williams Advanced Engineering (WAE) are developing an aerofoil which attaches to fridge shelves to keep more cool air inside.
